attributes.additional_details: Inspirational singer song writer should be given a knighthood not only for his contribition to the music industry but also as a pioneer for the Suffolk Music Foundation which supports young people under the age of 18 with small grants to help with study or playing music.
attributes.background:
Knight Ed Sheeran 
Sir Ed Sheeran

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
